AccountNumber.description: The account number associated with the account

AccountId.description: The unique identifier of the account

TimePeriod.description: The time period for which the data is being reported

CurrencyCode.description: The currency used for the financial metrics

AdDistribution.description: The distribution network where the ads were displayed (e.g., search, display)

Impressions.description: The total number of impressions on the ads

Clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the ads

Ctr.description: The click-through rate of the ad

Spend.description: The total amount spent on advertisements

AveragePosition.description: The average position of the ad on the search results page

Conversions.description: The total number of conversions tracked

ConversionRate.description: The rate at which conversions occur

LowQualityClicks.description: The number of clicks considered of low quality

LowQualityClicksPercent.description: The percentage of clicks classified as low quality

LowQualityImpressions.description: The number of impressions classified as low quality

LowQualityConversions.description: The total number of conversions from low-quality clicks

LowQualityConversionRate.description: The conversion rate attributed to low-quality clicks

DeviceType.description: The type of device on which the ad was displayed (e.g., desktop, mobile)

ImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of impressions captured out of total available impressions

ImpressionLostToBudgetPercent.description: The percentage of impressions lost due to budget limitations

ImpressionLostToRankAggPercent.description: The percentage of impressions lost to ranking aggregation

PhoneImpressions.description: The number of impressions on phone devices

PhoneCalls.description: The total number of phone calls generated by the ads

Ptr.description: The phone-through rate of the ad

Network.description: The advertising network where the ads were displayed

Assists.description: The number of assists in contributing to conversions

ReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on investment from ad spend

CostPerAssist.description: The cost per assist in contributing to conversions

RevenuePerConversion.description: The average revenue generated per conversion

RevenuePerAssist.description: The average revenue generated per assist in conversions

AccountStatus.description: The status of the account (e.g., active, paused, etc.)

LowQualityGeneralClicks.description: The number of general clicks considered of low quality

LowQualitySophisticatedClicks.description: The number of sophisticated clicks considered of low quality

ExactMatchImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of exact match impressions captured

ClickSharePercent.description: The share of clicks received out of the total available clicks

AbsoluteTopImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of impressions received in the absolute top location on the search results page

TopImpressionShareLostToRankPercent.description: The percentage of top impressions lost due to ad ranking

TopImpressionShareLostToBudgetPercent.description: The percentage of top impressions lost due to budget constraints

AbsoluteTopImpressionShareLostToRankPerc.description: The percentage of absolute top impressions lost due to ad ranking

AbsoluteTopImpressionShareLostToBudgetPe.description: The percentage of absolute top impressions lost due to budget constraints

TopImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of impressions received at the top position on the search results page

AbsoluteTopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of impressions that are shown in the absolute top position above the organic search results

TopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of impressions that appear at the top of search results

AllConversions.description: The total number of all conversions counted

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue generated from all conversions

AllConversionRate.description: The rate of all conversions that occurred

AllCostPerConversion.description: The cost per conversion for all conversions

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend generated by all conversions

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The average revenue generated per conversion from all conversions

ViewThroughConversions.description: The number of conversions attributed to view-through tracking

AudienceImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of impressions captured for the targeted audience

AudienceImpressionLostToRankPercent.description: The percentage of audience impressions lost due to ad ranking

AudienceImpressionLostToBudgetPercent.description: The percentage of audience impressions lost due to budget restrictions

AverageCpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions

LowQualityConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified conversions from low-quality clicks

AllConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified conversions of all types

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified conversions linked to view-through tracking

ViewThroughRevenue.description: The revenue generated from view-through conversions

VideoViews.description: The total number of views of video ads

ViewThroughRate.description: The rate at which view-through conversions occur

AverageCPV.description: The average cost per view of video ads

VideoViewsAt25Percent.description: The number of video views at 25% completion

VideoViewsAt50Percent.description: The number of video views at 50% completion

VideoViewsAt75Percent.description: The number of video views at 75% completion

CompletedVideoViews.description: The number of completed views of video ads

VideoCompletionRate.description: The rate of completed views of video ads

TotalWatchTimeInMS.description: The total watch time in milliseconds for video ads

AverageWatchTimePerVideoView.description: The average watch time per video view

AverageWatchTimePerImpression.description: The average watch time per impression for video ads

Sales.description: The total number of sales attributed to the ads

RevenuePerSale.description: The average revenue generated per sale

Installs.description: The total number of installations linked to the ads

RevenuePerInstall.description: The average revenue generated per installation
